Build Application from VI Dialog Box

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System

Select Tools»Build Application from VI to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to build a stand-alone application from an open VI. When you click Continue, LabVIEW creates a stand-alone application build specification within a new project and displays the Application Properties dialog box. LabVIEW adds the open VI under the Startup VIs tree on the Source Files page of the Application Properties dialog box.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • LabVIEW project (.lvproj) to create—Specifies the name of the project. Use the Browse button to navigate to and select the directory where you want to save the project.
  • Continue—Closes the Build Application from VI dialog box, creates a new project, adds the current VI to the project, creates a new application build specification, and opens the Application Properties dialog box for the build specification.
